metadata.Title: CVE-2023-41913 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Buffer Overflow When Handling DH Public Values

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-41913` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

charon-cmd - 5.9.5-2ubuntu2.2
charon-systemd - 5.9.5-2ubuntu2.2
libcharon-extauth-plugins - 5.9.5-2ubuntu2.2
libcharon-extra-plugins - 5.9.5-2ubuntu2.2
libstrongswan - 5.9.5-2ubuntu2.2
libstrongswan-extra-plugins - 5.9.5-2ubuntu2.2
libstrongswan-standard-plugins - 5.9.5-2ubuntu2.2
strongswan - 5.9.5-2ubuntu2.2
strongswan-charon - 5.9.5-2ubuntu2.2
strongswan-libcharon - 5.9.5-2ubuntu2.2
strongswan-nm - 5.9.5-2ubuntu2.2
strongswan-pki - 5.9.5-2ubuntu2.2
strongswan-scepclient - 5.9.5-2ubuntu2.2
strongswan-starter - 5.9.5-2ubuntu2.2
strongswan-swanctl - 5.9.5-2ubuntu2.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: strongswan package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.9.5-2ubuntu2.2').
